history.narrative: Law 17-124, the “District Funds Reserved Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-73 which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 11, 2007, and January 8, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 29, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-273 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-124 became effective on March 20, 2008.
